price: 113. Seul mon Seigneur peut dresser leur compte. Si seulement vous pouviez le sentir !
arabic: إِنۡ حِسَابُهُمۡ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّيۖ لَوۡ تَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: in ḥisābuhum illā ʿalā rabbī law tashʿurūna
